net.joeclark.proceduralgeneration

Class MarkovTextCasePreservingGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joeclark.proceduralgeneration.MarkovTextGenerator
      • net.joeclark.proceduralgeneration.MarkovTextCasePreservingGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomTextGenerator

    public class MarkovTextCasePreservingGenerator
extends MarkovTextGenerator
    An alternative implementation of MarkovTextGenerator that learns and reproduces upper/lower case usage in the training data. With a given dataset, this model may learn less effectively from the training data because it builds separate models for "A" and "a" (to give an example) instead of combining observations. However, this implementation may be preferable if the input data has interesting uses of capitalization (such as names that begin with "Mc" and "Mac" followed by capitals) that you want to re-generate.
